lines.text: For the last time, the lady will spare your life if you serve the lord Lucifer.
Heh! And become one of your Hounds?
Tell her she can go to hell!
She expects to.
How easy it is for the young to fall into temptation. Alas, even my own sister...
What happened to her, Friar?
Oh, she made a fortune...
Greedy little swine... And you, Verdelet, you can't even kill a priest!
You'll pay for his death! By heaven, you'll pay!
No. Not by heaven.
I don't like people. They can be so cruel.
I feared him. Why? Why did I fear him? He was dead. Dead! But he still came to Ravenscar... He still came!
Protection against the Hounds of Lucifer? Do you think arrows and swords can hold them off?
It's a lot better than salt!
Now you listen to me, friend, you can surround yourself with salt, soot, or sausages for all I care, but we've come too far to turn back now, eh? Men or demons, they're going to be dealt with!
We're not demons. We haven't got a single tail between us.
I want one alive.
I wish you had told me that sooner.
Now, you dogs, you will bark for me.
Pacts with the devil are not legally binding.
Tell that to James.
This is an outrage!
If you like.
You filthy villain!
You see, I've dealt with villains like you before. They're never content with ordinary lies. Ordinary lies would make them ordinary villains.
Such an evil tongue needs tearing out.

[introducing himself]
Nasir Malik Kemal Inal Ibrahim Shams ad-Dualla Wattab ibn Mahmud.
Nothing we make is good or evil until we use it. The power in Wayland's swords was blind. There lay the danger.
And Albion?
Albion is in good hands.
